name: PresidentHinckleyTalks
skdetail:

Invocation Name: president hinckley talks
des: Select talks from Gordon B. Hinckley, 15th President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints. Talks include 'Slow to Anger', 'The Stone Cut Out of the Mountain', 'I Am Clean', 'The Things of Which I Know' and 'Find the Lambs, Feed the Sheep'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
